/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and green accents, adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, providing a sense of order and symmetry. In the distance, the faint outline of mountains can be seen, adding a natural element to the scene. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the cityscape.
